caoss.simulator.os

Interface InterruptHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SysCallHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyDeviceInterruptHandler, ExitSyscallHandler, IOSyscallHandler, SysCallInterruptHandler, TimerInterruptHandler

    public interface InterruptHandler
    Interface for an interrupt handler For protection purposes, interrupt handler implementations should be package private
    Author:
    Herve Paulino

      Handler implementation
